Player History
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $2,736,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Dennis Eckersley (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/1985, off Mario Soto (CIN)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Cincinnati on 4/8/1985...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 8/29/1985...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1985, hitting .347 with 8 HR, 28 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/1985, hitting .346 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago on 5/5/1986...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 8/23/1986...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1986, hitting .364 with 8 HR, 21 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/6/1987 to a 4-year deal worth $11,000,000 per year...
Injured on 3/20/1987 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/1989, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
Traded from Pittsburgh to San Diego on 7/27/1990 (Going to SD: 1B Eddie Murray. Going to PIT: LF Kenny Williams)...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/18/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/1991, hitting .520 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Los Angeles on 5/28/1991...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
